NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Distribution and column Processing is the flow between 3930 and 4893? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Packaging to node Food Preparation and from node Packaging to node Food Waste, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Packaging} to node {Food Preparation} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Storage to node Packaging, from node Storage to node Grinding, and from node Storage to node Freezing, which path has the largest flow?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Retail Delivery to target node Food Waste? Please list all node labels along this path.
